channel.title: active_class on Jeds Digital Home
channel.description: Recent content in active_class on Jeds Digital Home

item.title: Data Management with SQL
item.description: General Information Welcome to DATA 351: Data Management with SQL! This is my personal website, and will be the main location where I post things throughout the semester. Anything posted elsewhere will be clearly indicated and announced in class! In general this should be your one-stop-shop for everything class related. Syllabus If you need a quick reference or review, you can find my syllabus here: Syllabus The Book We will be using this semester is Practical SQL: A Beginner’s Guide to Storytelling with Data by Anthony DeBarros.
